TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but you die of exhaustion.

I wish my computer was faster

Granted, your computer accelerates to 30m/s in the car of the person who stole it.

I wish my computer was newer.

granted, your wish is simply corrupted to the point you don't get the notice to use it

i wish more corruption

Edited June 4, 2014 by WinkAllKerb''
here we go appollo ;)

Granted.

...

What? Ah sorry also have to corrupt it... Granted. but there is much more of it than you would expect and people die because of it.

Granted. The wish granting Kerman walks up to you and tapes a piece of paper to your head that says simply "Dat Wish Doe".

I wish these corruptions were more creative.

Granted. The corruptions create an avalanche of artwork pieces that fill your living space.

I wish more people were interested in space exploration.

Granted. We send so many ships into space that the Kessler Effect happens.

I wish I was better at Crusader Kings 2.

Granted. However, the game is no longer any fun.

I wish to be able to eat as much bacon as I want without gaining wait or getting high cholesterol.

Granted: after one kilogram of bacon you now think it's disgusting - for the rest of your life.

I wish I was less lazy about making uToob videos.

Granted. You make tons of vids - but no one ever watches them, because google deletes them.

I wish I was Corvo Attano.

Granted, but I don't know who that is so you become George Costanza instead.

I wish for more pi-based novels or stories.

Granted, usable space is no more because of infinite decimals.

I wish for no more pi.

granted, the universe ceases to existed due to the lack of pi

i wish that i had a job

Granted, you are Mike Rowe's partner.

I wish that it doesn't rain today.

Granted. Now it snows and temperature is -80 degrees celsius.

I wish for temperate temperature.

Venus Temperate? Sure!

I wish for 10 millimetres of rain.

Granted, but you accidentally put 'MM' instead of 'mm' so you get 10 megametres of rain; Fun!

I wish for... IMMORTALITY! *Evil laugh*

You outlast everyone, become bored of life and fold into fetal position.

I wish for an explosion to be centred on the next poster.

Granted. However, I am immortal.

I wish for this evil British Mudkip do disappear.

The Evil British Mudkip disappears from existence and, using the Law of Conservation, with the destruction of matter the entire multiverse ends.

I wish for my parents back. (I do have parents, who are alive, so this is just a joke.)

Granted. They are zombies. (They did come back from the dead.)

I wish of the mudkip imposter to be disappeared (?) by the real mudkip.

Nope.

I wish all the electricity on the planet suddenly stops. (I'm using reverse psychology)

Granted. Reverse psychology doesn't work on Mudkipz.

I wish for m0ar wattah tiepz.

Granted. Fire no longer exists due to the lack of electrons around molecules and atoms to COwater types inhabiting intermolecular space, but water types are now seltzer types. You die in a searing pile of protons.

I wish that the mushroom islands in minecraft could spawn with Corruption and Crimson instead of mushroom, each of the 3 with a 1/3rd chance of inhabiting a given mushroom island.

Edited June 5, 2014 by Tery215

Granted,but they have nasty beasties that are impossible to kill and the corruption/crimson spreads at ludicrous rates (oh and also it makes the game 2d, so gg).

I wish for the next guy to corrupt this wish in a clever way.
